results.name: Motto By Hilton Washington DC City Center
results.description:
Our micro-hotel, in downtown Washington DC's vibrant Penn Quarter, offers an exceptional experience. Located across the street from the Gallery Place/Chinatown metro station, we are perfectly positioned to explore the nation's capital. We're only three blocks from the Washington DC Convention Center, and within a one-mile radius of Union Station, the iconic National Mall or the historic White House.

At our micro-hotel, we pride ourselves on offering modern comfort with innovative technology. Our Cleverly Compact rooms are equipped with Connected Room technology, allowing you to effortlessly open your door, stream content to your TV or customize climate and lighting, all at your fingertips through the Hilton Honors app. You'll also enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, a spacious work desk, and convenient USB charging ports in every room.

As for dining and social spaces, we offer a variety of options to suit your preferences. Savor delectable dishes at our inviting diner or grab a quick caffeine fix at our cozy coffee bar/cafe. And when it comes to unwinding with a view, head to our spectacular rooftop bar with a captivating vista of the Washington Monument. For whiskey enthusiasts, our expansive 7,000 square feet whiskey bar is a must-visit, offering a carefully curated selection of spirits (local laws apply). Enjoy a quiet escape, a vibrant social experience, or a taste of local culture.

Please note that reservations are required in advance for self-parking, with associated fees. Unfortunately, valet parking is not available. For more information or to schedule self-parking, please contact us. Your unforgettable stay in Washington DC begins with us.

results.name: The River Inn
results.description:
The River Inn is a boutique hotel tucked away on a tree-lined street in the coveted Washington, DC neighborhood of Foggy Bottom. Centrally located four blocks from the Kennedy Center, three blocks from the metro, and five blocks to the picturesque shops and restaurants of Georgetown - there is so much to explore just steps away. The National Mall, Smithsonian Institute and White House are all just a quick metro ride away as well. 
 
A true blend of intimate charm and relaxation, The River Inn is the perfect pied-a-terre equipped with comfortable accommodations, personalized service, and convenient amenities.  Make yourself at home with spacious, elegantly furnished suites featuring a full kitchen, comfortable dining nook and living area. Each suite also features a 6-foot desk, ideal for working away from home or the office and many suites lookout to beautiful views of the Potomac River and Georgetown. Take advantage of hotel amenities, such as complimentary REI Bicycles to explore the neighborhood or C&O Canal Path. Dine at our restaurant Matera, open daily for breakfast and for dinner from Tuesday to Saturday. The River Inn fulfills a very important role: to personalize every experience to the distinct needs of each guest, allowing guests to escape the hustle and bustle of the city and experience DC at your own, relaxed pace.

Generator has the facilities, the location and the can-do attitude to help you close out a successful yet relaxing trip. Here for the sights? Generator's welcoming and well appointed hotel is 2 blocks from the Dupont Circle Metro station so getting around town is super easy. You can feel the endless energy of the city's diplomatic life, plugged into U.S. and global politics, business, finance and education. Washington DC is an almost endless parade of places you already recognize from the movies and from the most important news stories of the day - every day. And that feeling of familiarity starts the second you check in with us at Generator Washington DC. We're friendly, we're not into formality, but we are into giving you an experience with a little more wow than you'll get anywhere else. results.name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Washington DC Capitol-Navy Yard
results.description:
A Vibrant Hotel Near Washington DC Landmarks

Just across the street from the Navy Yard Metro Station, the Homewood Suites by Hilton Washington DC Capitol-Navy Yard provides easy access to Capitol Hill, government offices and the central business district. Our all-suite hotel is located near the Washington Navy Yard, Washington Monument and the Anacostia River. Marvel at some of Washington DC's most famous landmarks from our rooftop terrace or the comfort of your stylish suite. With a modern glass facade and fresh, contemporary decor, our hotel provides an ideal base for your trip to Washington DC.

Settle into your roomy suite and enjoy views of our nation's capital through modern floor-to-ceiling windows. Each of our spacious one- and two-bedroom suites features free WiFi, a full kitchen and a 37-inch HDTV. Upgrade your suite and enjoy a corner suite or views of Nationals Park. Wake up to free hot breakfast each morning and our evening social* Wednesdays.

results.name: Washington Marriott at Metro Center
results.description: Washington Marriott at Metro Center features convenient access to the best attractions and shopping and dining in the nation's capital. Our downtown Washington, D.C. hotel offers a premier location near the metro, giving guests easy access to the National Mall, Smithsonian Institution, CityCenterDC, Spy Museum, and the National Portrait Gallery. Located within blocks of the Capital One Arena, our hotel offers stylish surroundings for guests attending conferences, sporting events, or concerts. Washington Marriott at Metro Center's engaging environment and Starbucks Cafe make us an excellent choice for business and leisure travelers. Meeting planners can explore the possibilities with over 14,000 sq--Ft. Of event space and 15 breakout rooms, perfect for hosting various gatherings and events. With access to the region's major airports, Union Station, and the Convention Center, Washington Marriott at Metro Center is a top choice for travelers to D.C. The pool area will not be available to guests from January - March 2023 while improvements are being made.

results.name: The Westin Georgetown, Washington D.C.
results.description: The Westin Georgetown, Washington D.C., is a refreshing choice for those traveling to Washington, D.C., for business or leisure. Situated in the trendy West End, enjoy a short walk to shopping and dining in historic Georgetown, The White House, Kennedy Center, and Dupont Circle. Whether planning a wedding at our stunning Courtyard or participating in a business event, this dog-friendly hotel will make you feel better when you leave than when you arrive!

results.name: Cambria Hotel Washington, D.C. Convention Center
results.description: This CAMBRiA hotel & suites(R) hotel is located in the heart of downtown Washington, DC and within walking distance to the Walter E. Washington Convention Center. Shopping, dining and sightseeing await you during your stay at the CAMBRiA hotel and Suites Washington DC Convention Center, and you'll be just minutes away from some of the most popular Washington, D.C. destinations, such as Smithsonian Museums, National Air and Space Museum, National Mall and The White House. CAMBRiA hotel and Suites Washington, DC is also easily accessible from Union Station and near the Verizon Center, Ford Theatre, Howard University and the Federal Bureau of Investigation headquarters. The CAMBRiA hotel and Suites Washington, DC is an all suite hotel. All the suites feature oversized accommodations with a large workspace, and offer two flat-screen LCD televisions, sleeper sofa, microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, hair dryer, iron and ironing board.
